metadata.name: element-plus
metadata.description: Element Plus Vue 3组件库插件，提供丰富的UI组件
metadata.author: Scaffold Generator

files.content: {{#if (includes extraTools 'icons')}} import { Setting, Plus } from '@element-plus/icons-vue'; {{/if}} import { ElMessage } from 'element-plus'; const handleClick = () => { ElMessage.success('欢迎使用 Element Plus！'); };

plugins.name: AutoImport
plugins.import: import AutoImport from 'unplugin-auto-import/vite'; import { ElementPlusResolver } from 'unplugin-vue-components/resolvers';

plugins.name: Components
